channel.title: Blitz-Scape [BETA]- Client Finished!
channel.description:
[center][size=10pt]Blitz-Scape Dev. Team[/size][/center]
[center]General Information: Blitz-Scape is a brand new private server. Just started it about 2 weeks ago, recently had some major updates. The whole layout is posted below. Job applications, and beta tester applications are posted below. The server is set to open for tuesday, wednesday im on an airplane, but it will definitely be up thursday, unless i have difficulty getting it up in LA.
Recent Updates: -Client finished -All skillcapes finished (Only releasing the ones for the working skills) -Added Every Runescape Item -New 3rd age gold and white -Commands taken out -XP slowed, still a good rate -Anti Cheat software installed -All client files have been encrypted, ready for release -Closed client source -Set calander dates for stages -Added Ghost private server control -Added Forums (look below) -Added Barrows -Added NPC's, with good drops -Re-made party hats -New recouloured Items
More Updates Will Come Today
Client Board: There will be a board of members, they will not be selected until the end of the first month. These members will be almost like the supreeme court. They will make/delete rules, vote for updates, ect. You will vote for them though, which should be inteseting. They will have there own zone, and i will be coding a courthouse. Each board member will have a custom skillcape with a golden star on the back. In will be cyan and white, with a gold trim. They will also be given a custom party hat.
BETA- December 25th 2007 Alpha- January 5th 2007 Version One- January 10th 2007 Final Release- January 20th 2007
Forums: [url=http://Forums.Ipbfree.com]Forums.Ipbfree.com[/url]
Jobs Available..
Server Coders: - Swintell -
Forum Coders -RueAngel -
Beta Testers - - - -
Server Mods - -
Hoster (May be getting a dedication) - -
Applications:
[code]Name: Age: Msn/Email: Position: Reason why we should pick you: Time Online: Proof Of Work(Not Required): Server Name: [/code]
Thats All for now. The thread will be updated in 7 hours.
Post Away![/center]

item.title: Blitz-Scape [BETA]- Client Finished!
item.dc:creator: @hartman hartman
item.description:
@hartman wrote:

[center][size=10pt]Blitz-Scape Dev. Team[/size][/center]

[center]General Information:
Blitz-Scape is a brand new private server. Just started it about 2 weeks ago, recently had some major updates. The whole layout is posted below. Job applications, and beta tester applications are posted below. The server is set to open for tuesday, wednesday im on an airplane, but it will definitely be up thursday, unless i have difficulty getting it up in LA.

Recent Updates:
-Client finished
-All skillcapes finished (Only releasing the ones for the working skills)
-Added Every Runescape Item
-New 3rd age gold and white
-Commands taken out
-XP slowed, still a good rate
-Anti Cheat software installed
-All client files have been encrypted, ready for release
-Closed client source
-Set calander dates for stages
-Added Ghost private server control
-Added Forums (look below)
-Added Barrows
-Added NPC’s, with good drops
-Re-made party hats
-New recouloured Items

More Updates Will Come Today

Client Board:
There will be a board of members, they will not be selected until the end of the first month. These members will be almost like the supreeme court. They will make/delete rules, vote for updates, ect. You will vote for them though, which should be inteseting. They will have there own zone, and i will be coding a courthouse. Each board member will have a custom skillcape with a golden star on the back. In will be cyan and white, with a gold trim. They will also be given a custom party hat.

BETA- December 25th 2007
Alpha- January 5th 2007
Version One- January 10th 2007
Final Release- January 20th 2007

Forums: Forums.Ipbfree.com

Jobs Available…

Server Coders:

  • Swintell

Forum Coders
-RueAngel

Beta Testers

Server Mods

Hoster (May be getting a dedication)

Applications:

Name: Age: Msn/Email: Position: Reason why we should pick you: Time Online: Proof Of Work(Not Required): Server Name:

Thats All for now. The thread will be updated in 7 hours.

Post Away![/center]
